type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.GroovyCompile
type.description: Compiles Groovy source files, and optionally, Java source files.

method.name: getGroovyClasspath
method.description:
Returns the classpath containing the version of Groovy to use for compilation.

returns:The classpath.

method.name: getGroovyOptions
method.description:
Gets the options for the Groovy compilation. To set specific options for the nested Java compilation, use #getOptions().

returns:The Groovy compile options. Never returns null.

method.name: getOptions
method.description:
Returns the options for Java compilation.

returns:The Java compile options. Never returns null.

method.name: setGroovyClasspath
method.description:
Sets the classpath containing the version of Groovy to use for compilation.
param:groovyClasspath The classpath. Must not be null.

property.name: groovyClasspath
property.description:
Returns the classpath containing the version of Groovy to use for compilation.

returns:The classpath.

property.name: groovyOptions
property.description:
Gets the options for the Groovy compilation. To set specific options for the nested Java compilation, use #getOptions().

returns:The Groovy compile options. Never returns null.

property.name: options
property.description:
Returns the options for Java compilation.

returns:The Java compile options. Never returns null.
